articles.title: IN PICTURES: Massive Fire Engulfs Noida Factory, 14 Fire Tenders at Spot - India.com
articles.description: A massive fire broke out at a multi-storey factory in Noida's Sector 3. 14 fire tenders have reached the spot from the industrial area phase one, Sector 2 fire station and other fire stations.
articles.content: Image credit: ANIThe fire reportedly took place at around 3 pm and the fire department reached the site at around 3.25 pm.
